E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 6/21/1990
Subject: Wilson Alvarez healing process
Wilson Alvarez is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 7/7/1990
Subject: Status of Scott Coolbaugh
Dear Sir,
Scott Coolbaugh shouldn't play at AA Jackson Mets!
He has an AVG of .189 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 7/9/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Guy Hoffman



Date: Saturday, 7/12/1990
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Rick Honeycutt



Date: Saturday, 7/12/1990
Subject: Extension?
Dear Sir,
I am really enjoying playing for your team.
I would be interested in a contract extension!
How about you?

Regards,
Dan Quisenberry
